Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン、 <Blue>思念<White>の浄化は失敗だったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune, did we fail to purge his <Blue>Will<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、その<Blue>思念<White>をきっかけに、 潜在的な意識が表面化してしまった。
Entry.EnglishText: But the latent consciousness brought about by his <Blue>Will<White> is coming to a head.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間の対抗意識や差別、 憎しみやねたみ、怒り……
Entry.EnglishText: The animosity between the races— the discrimination, the hatred, the envy, and the anger...

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな負の感情が高まって、 世界を覆い始めている。
Entry.EnglishText: These negative emotions have accumulated, and have begun enveloping the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: 負の感情が、世界を覆っている？ 何が起こるんだ!?
Entry.EnglishText: The negative emotions are enveloping the world? What happened?!

Entry.JapaneseText: わからない。この状況は、ぼくたち 聖獣の予測の範囲を超えているんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know. This situation was unfathomable to us Sacred Beasts.

Entry.JapaneseText: 負の感情が、世界そのものを揺るがす 災いになる事だって考えられる。
Entry.EnglishText: It's possible that these emotions could spell a disaster that rocks the entire world.

Entry.JapaneseText: その災いを回避するために、ぼくは 君たちのところに戻って来たんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: To help prevent such a calamity, I've come back to you guys!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちはどうすればいい？
Entry.EnglishText: What can we do about it?

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、人々の争いを止めて、 少しでも負の感情を抑えるしかない。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, you need to stop everyone from fighting and get these emotions under control to the best of your abilities.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった……国中を見て回ろう!!
Entry.EnglishText: All right... Let's take a look around the Kingdom!
